content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UBS Gdansk Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity Plan\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training is the UBS Gdansk specific extension of the EPAM Business Continuity Program. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download the document from\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/getAttachment.do?id=4000741400060875255\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/getAttachment.do?id=4000741400060875255\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and read it carefully.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
